nodes.text: Around 3642 BBY, Darth Baras's apprentice was assigned to eliminate the Galactic Republic's leading strategists of the War Trust. With Plan Zero enacted, Darth Baras was assigned by his master Darth Vengean to eliminate the Republic's military leaders in preparation for the coming Galactic War with the Sith Empire. Baras ordered his Sith apprentice, recently promoted to Sith Lord, to travel to the planet Taris and eliminate four of these military leaders, who comprised the War Trust.
